dcterms:description: This large-scale dataset has been widely used to evaluate action recognition models. It contains 56,000 action clips for 60 action classes, featuring 40 volunteers. Each clip is captured by three Kinect cameras from different angles, providing 3D skeleton sequences and corresponding 2D pose coordinates.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60

dcterms:description: This is an extension of NTU RGB+D 60 and is currently the largest indoor action recognition dataset. It contains 114,480 action clips for 120 classes, featuring 106 volunteers, and provides 3D skeleton sequences and corresponding 2D pose coordinates.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120
